text.emotional: The last stalls at the end of the market saw me off with some fancy floral notes, luring in some sweet grandmas to buy gardenias and petunias for their balcony.
text.silence: {.} the last stalls at the end of the market saw me off with some fancy floral notes {...} luring in some sweet grandmas to buy gardenias and petunias for their balcony {..}
